highlights: Designed and developed features for a credit risk platform with optimized risk rating models to enhance decision-making accuracy for commercial loan applications.
Led the design of a full-stack REST API generation tool using Python, defining backend architecture and data models to accelerate model deployment from 6 months to 1 month.
Created an automated test generation tool (Python, Jenkins) to validate model performance, cutting manual testing time from a month to a week

Engineered an interactive sandbox platform in Angular and TypeScript that enabled underwriters to simulate credit risk rating models, significantly reducing the risk of errors in live lending decision.

Integrated dynamic UI components in Angular to pre-populate previous ratings for underwriters based on specific conditions, thereby reducing the time required for re-rating models in monthly reports by 90%.
Designed a flexible ETL solution in Java, enabling seamless integration of model-generated data with legacy systems and facilitating the data pipelines and data-driven analytics.
Managed deployment of various services on CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, Kubernetes, AWS), ensuring continuous delivery by automating the process and reducing production release time to one week.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including Product Managers and Program Managers, to promote tool adoption, migrating two models per quarter.
Mentored and onboarded developers, ensuring efficient adoption and modification of existing services.
Oversaw repository maintenance, addressing vulnerabilities, infrastructure updates, and ensuring optimal codebase health.
Proficient in Agile methodologies, Test driven development, applying Git for version control, and actively participating in sprint planning and refinement processes.
Employed AI-powered coding assistants to streamline the scaffolding of new REST APIs and data models, cutting initial setup time and enhancing adherence to design patterns.

Leveraged AI-assisted development to accelerate the generation of comprehensive unit tests, reducing associated task completion time by 50% (from two days to one) and consistently achieving the 80% code coverage standard for all new features.

Designed and implemented scalable RESTful APIs using Spring Boot, leveraging ORM principles with Spring Data JPA to structure relational data access. Ensured API consistency and code quality by implementing automated testing with Postman, JUnit, and Mockito.
Designed responsive user interfaces in Angular and Bootstrap, implementing client-side data caching and lazy loading to significantly optimize page load times and enhance user experience.
Developed and tested REST API endpoints using the Spring framework and built a unit testing infrastructure with Selenium, which reduced defects found during development.

skills.name: Frameworks
keywords: Flask, Angular, Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA

skills.name: Tools & Platforms
keywords: Git, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Copilot

skills.name: Concepts/Methodologies
keywords: System Design, Distributed Systems, CI/CD, Data Pipelines

professional_summary: Senior Software Development Engineer with 6 years of experience building and scaling high-performance backend and platform services. Expert in developing robust **services** using Python, Java (Spring Boot), and Angular, with a proven track record in engineering scalable APIs and data solutions. Adept at collaborating across **engineering teams** and leveraging modern tools to ensure **continuous delivery** of high-quality video platform functionality.
